events.message: I received my order yesterday but unfortunately the item is not what I expected and I want to request a refund. The product does not match the description on your website.
The customer's issue has been categorized as a refund request based on their message mentioning refund and dissatisfaction with the product received.
Assigning customer support agent to handle refund request for the customer's order that did not meet their expectations.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request and ensure we resolve your issue quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason you want a refund so we can process it efficiently?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product looked different from the pictures and the quality is not as expected, so I want my money back.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and you should see the money returned to your payment method within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate you handling this swiftly and look forward to receiving my refund soon.
Your refund request has been successfully processed. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory on your end.
As there have been no further responses, we are closing the case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
